message.body:
Prototyping conversation re the Coffee chat: dynamic share part 1. The importance and lure of processing information In the "analog"?
I am free except when I am in class, so u tell me when a good time is for you. Topic is subject to change as is the buzz from the beer I had earlier.
Please tell Cheryl that she either looks like someone I have known and cared for or I was close to her in another life.

Will you be in the studio this weekend? Looking forward to our chat.
I am free after classes and after 7 on Thursdays (except this week). I could also meet early morning before work.
This work full time with three classes is difficult!
Yes weekend studio time would be perfect! Lets say saturday, afternoon. I have no clue how you do it... Im struggling to keep up with four classes no job.
